Name: ENCYCLE
About the game: A kaleidoscopic journey through a psychedelic labyrinth. In ENCYCLE you make your way through a strange and dangerous universe where music, color and geometry blend into a beautiful visual trip. A perfect mash-up between a game and music visualizer that spans from chill to hyper-energized! In Journey Mode you explore a cornucopia of kaleidoscopic visuals set to a variety of electronic music as the surrounding universe becomes more and more challenging. In Custom mode you load up your own track and move your way through it at your desired difficulty. 100 levels with increasing difficulty Play Your Own Music, either load up your own MP3 or use the microphone to stream any audio! Unique visual and sound design. Challenging and interesting levels! A laid-back atmosphere. Phat Beatz
